Action - Wall: up to 90 × 30 × 1 ( 60 ft. ) - 9th Level (Abjuration) - VSM (a piece of clear crystal) - 10 Minutes



Utility

  • You conjure a shimmering, multicolored wall of light. Choose either a vertical opaque wall (up to 90 ft. long, 30 ft. high, 1 in. thick) or a 30-ft. sphere.

  • The wall sheds bright light to 100 ft. and dim light for another 100 ft.

  • Allies designated at the time of casting can pass freely without harm.

  • Creatures passing through the wall do so one layer at a time, making saving throws against each layer. Look at wall layers below.

  • The wall can only be destroyed layer by layer, from Red → Violet. @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.Ay9J4z6Zf9hl6d4w]{Antimagic Field} has no effect. @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.oZwKW3I3yzrSdpLE]{Dispel Magic} only works against the Violet layer.



1 Minute


Creatures within 20 ft. of the wall


[[/save CON]]{Constitution Save}

  • Failure : Target is &reference[Blinded]

  • Success: No effect.



Wall Layers

  • Red: [[/save DEX]] or take [[/damage 10d6 fire]] fire damage (half on success). Blocks nonmagical ranged attacks. Destroyed by 25 cold damage.

  • Orange: [[/save DEX]] or take [[/damage 10d6 acid]] acid damage (half on success). Blocks magical ranged attacks. Destroyed by strong wind.

  • Yellow: [[/save DEX]] or take [[/damage 10d6 lightning]] lightning damage (half on success). Destroyed by 60 force damage.

  • Green: [[/save CON]] or take [[/damage 10d6 poison]] poison damage (half on success). Destroyed by Passwall or similar spell of 5th+ level.

  • Blue: [[/save CON]] or take [[/damage 10d6 cold]] cold damage (half on success). Destroyed by 25 fire damage.

  • Indigo: [[/save WIS]] or be &reference[Restrained]. At the end of each turn, make a [[/save CON]]{CON} save:

    • 3 successes: effect ends.

    • 3 failures: target becomes permanently &reference[Petrified].

    Blocks spells from passing through. Destroyed by &reference[bright light] from @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.jdFMmZrR5TJegYvD]{Daylight} or a 3rd+ level spell that emits bright light.

  • Violet: [[/save WIS]] or be &reference[Blinded]. At the start of your next turn, make another WIS save:

    • Failure: Target is banished to another plane (DM’s choice, typically home plane or Astral/Ethereal).

    • Success : Blindness ends.

    Destroyed by @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.oZwKW3I3yzrSdpLE]{Dispel Magic} or similar spell of 6th+ level that can end magical effects.
